title: Share of Americans with at least one tattoo - by age 2003 to 2015
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of Americans with at least one tattoo on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 4 groups 2003, 2008, 2012, and 2015 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 4 groups, 2015 had the highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo in Country 30 to 39 and 2012 had the lowest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo in Country 65 and older.
Among all the Countrys, 2008 had the highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo 32.0 in Country 25 to 29 and lowest value 8.0 in Country 50 to 64.
There is a gap of 24.0 between the highest and lowest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo found for 2008 in Country 25 to 29 and 50 to 64.
yAxis: Share of Americans with at least one tattoo

mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of Americans with at least one tattoo on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 4 groups 2003, 2008, 2012, and 2015 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 4 groups, 2015 had the highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo in Country 30 to 39 and 2012 had the lowest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo in Country 65 and older.
Among all the Countrys, 2008 had the highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo 32.0 in Country 25 to 29 and lowest value 8.0 in Country 50 to 64.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Countrys on X-axis for 4 groups 2003, 2008, 2012, and 2015. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of Americans with at least one tattoo.
Out of all 4 groups, 2015 had the highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo in Country 30 to 39 and 2012 had the lowest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo in Country 65 and older.
In Country 25 to 29, 2008 had the maximum Share of Americans with at least one tattoo and it saw the lowest in Country 50 to 64 out of all 6 Countrys.

The maximum Share of Americans with at least one tattoo for 2008 that was found in Country 25 to 29 was 4.0 times larger than the minimum Share of Americans with at least one tattoo observed in Country 50 to 64.
Among all 4 groups, 2012 had the gap of 33.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of Americans with at least one tattoo observed in Country 30 to 39 and 65 and older respectively.

In Country 30 to 39, 2015 had the highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo 55.0 among the 4 groups and in 65 and older, 2012 had the lowest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo 5.0. The second highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo 36.0 was observed for 2015 in Country 30 to 39.

On average, the Country 30 to 39 had the highest Share of Americans with at least one tattoo for all 4 groups 2003, 2008, 2012, and 2015. Whereas 65 and older had the lowest average Share of Americans with at least one tattoo.
